name: Bring the Fire
description:
Prototype of an Adventure/Puzzle little game.

On this game,  You play as Duncan, a brave knight who wants to eat a hamburger... But this one is sealed ! To get it back, Duncan will have to go through a series of levels to find the three sacred flames that will allow him to access it.

  • Controls : ZQSD pour move, Mouse or A/E for rotate the camera. The game is also normally playable with a pad.
  • Software used : Unity ; Blender (for additional modelling) ; Photoshop (for creating some textures) ; Materialize (for editing texture).

Good luck and have fun !
